docs.snippet: CARACAS, Venezuela, March 20--The second Festival of  Latin-American Music, which began here last night, has to be observed to be believed. It could be brought into being on this scale only by people who combine pioneering spirit with respect for...
docs.lead_paragraph: CARACAS, Venezuela, March 20--The second Festival of Latin-American Music, which began here last night, has to be observed to be believed. It could be brought into being on this scale only by people who combine pioneering spirit with respect for civilized values.

docs.snippet: Mikhail Botvinnik, the champion, and Vassily Smyslov were still tied, at 3 -3 , after the seventh game of their world title match at the Tchaikowsky Music Hall in Moscow, according to a report received last night through Soviet news sources.

docs.snippet: CARACAS, Venezuela, March 25--Isn't a composer best equipped to sing the praises of inter-American amity? Carlos Chavez, Mexican composer, is not only well equipped but has a special reason to indite a grateful song.
